# Microsoft.Data.Sqlite

> Lightweight ADO.NET provider for SQLite databases. Implements standard ADO.NET abstractions (`SqliteConnection`, `SqliteCommand`, `SqliteDataReader`) for embedded database access. Supports connection strings, parameters, transactions, async operations, encryption, blob I/O, and user-defined functions. Entity Framework Core's SQLite provider is built on this library.

- [ADO.NET limitations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/adonet-limitations.md): Describes some of the ADO.NET limitations you might encounter.
- [Async limitations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/async.md): Explains the limitations of the async APIs and some alternatives that you can use instead.
- [Online backup](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/backup.md): Learn how to use SQLite's online backup feature.
- [Batching](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/batching.md): Learn how to execute a batch of SQL statements in a single command.
- [Blob I/O](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/blob-io.md): Learn how to use SQLite's BLOB I/O feature.
- [Bulk insert](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/bulk-insert.md): Performance tips you can use when making numerous changes to the database.
- [Collation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/collation.md): Learn how to create a custom collating sequence.
- [Comparison to System.Data.SQLite](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/compare.md): Describes some of the differences between the Microsoft.Data.Sqlite and System.Data.SQLite libraries.
- [Connection strings](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/connection-strings.md): The supported keywords and values of connection strings.
- [Custom SQLite versions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/custom-versions.md): Learn how to use a custom version of the native SQLite library.
- [Dapper limitations](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/dapper-limitations.md): Describes some of the limitations you will encounter when using Dapper.
- [Database errors](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/database-errors.md): Describes how database errors and retries are handled by the library.
- [Encryption](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/encryption.md): Learn how to encrypt your database file.
- [Extensions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/extensions.md): Learn how to load SQLite extensions.
- [In-memory databases](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/in-memory-databases.md): Learn how to use in-memory SQLite databases.
- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/index.md): An overview of Microsoft.Data.Sqlite
- [Interoperability](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/interop.md): Learn how to interoperate with other SQLite libraries.
- [Metadata (Sqlite)](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/metadata.md): Learn how to retrieve metadata about a Sqlite database.
- [Parameters](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/parameters.md): Learn how to use SQL parameters.
- [Transactions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/transactions.md): Learn how to use transactions.
- [Data types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/types.md): Describes the supported data types and some of the limitations around them.
- [User-defined functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/data/sqlite/user-defined-functions.md): Learn how to create user-defined scalar and aggregate functions.
